title: Thanks for ruining annie riot
body:
annie used to be a well rounded character and powerful, which is why you played her to be nukey/powerful. you had that extra little range for a stun with tibbers. now shes useless, under ranged and under powered in a sea of overpowered champions

thanks riot!

replies.body: Lol? She has a consistently above average win rate across multiple elos, sitting around 9th to 20th place. Thanks for complaining about something that you are biased about!
..Annie has not been meaningfully changed in what, over a year?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1T3EhKaV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-22T21:12:27.915+0000)
>
> ..Annie has not been meaningfully changed in what, over a year?

Midseason they made Tibbers stronger by making him rampage all over Annie's killer when she dies or anyone Annie stuns with her passive. However, they didn't nerf her at all and haven't nerfed her really at all in at least 3 years.
Annie hasn't been touched at all other than buffs in literally like 3 years at least.
her ult can be one of the most broken abilities in the game LOL
That goes for all ults tbh.
Annie Bot still plays annie. If someone is able to play something so dedicated-ly despite it being trash, then it's not technically "trash", just niche.

Honestly, I think it's your playstyle.

I have 80-90K mastery score on Annie and they only thing I can with her is farm perfectly and I know my combos.
She's my most played champion; all my others are max 45K.

But I suck with her.
I really suck with her.
I think her range is too low, FOR ME.

I figured out that maybe it's me, and not Annie.
I don't play her often nowadays and I play other champions more. With more succes.

Some playstyles just don't fit you, no matter how hard you try.
And I think Annie doesn't fit for you.
Oh yeah, that mage that literally has to aim nothing, gets tanky for just pressing E, and has a mini sion passive on her ult is totally weak. Did I mentioning her flash ult still exists?

Annie is plenty strong. They even buffed her and added cool interactions with Tibbers.

If you've had some bad games as her that is probably because your account hasn't been used in 12 months (I checked). You're probably rusty and making mistakes. That's not Annie's fault.
Hm hasn't Annie been in this state for months?
